text: Luís Martins may refer to: * Luís Martins (footballer, born 1963), Portuguese football manager * Luís Martins (footballer, born June 1992), Portuguese footballer * Luís Martins (footballer, born October 1992), Portuguese footballer * Luís Carlos Martins (born 1955), Brazilian professional football manager * Luís Paixão Martins (born 1954), Portuguese communication and public relations consultant
title: Luís Martins
